overview:
Stephen Sadler is a professional in web broadcast technology, digital media, digital marketing, software engineering, robotics, and cloud computing.

As an entrepreneur and the CEO of Buz.fm Inc., Stephen possesses a unique skill-set that helps him to develop and incubate business silos, technologies and relationships.

Stephen currently holds patents for various technologies in social media, digital marketing, media presentation, e-learning, sports video statistics and automotive vision.

In addition to being a registered inventor, Stephen is also the author of the book “Exposure to Closure - The Rise of Frequency Marketing” .

Steve was born in Nottingham England, raised in Blenheim, Ontario, Canada and in 2006 became a US Citizen. Steve and his wife are also the founders and primary shareholders of the Michigan based software development company SCATE Technologies, Inc. where he is currently the CEO and President.
